segments.text: Hello , jewelry department . How may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's me , Ali . There's this strange guy who keeps coming around . He's been here three times this week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He's probably a pervert . Just ignore him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He makes me nervous . He looks at me funny . And he never buys anything !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe he wants to get something for his girlfriend , but he's embarrassed .
segments.speaker: S1
